answerText: aldol reaction [or aldol addition; or aldol condensation][10] Enolates can be generated from their corresponding keto/enol tautomers by reacting them with a strong one of these compounds. These compounds accept protons according to the Bronsted-Lowry definition.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | Maryland A-Kansas State-Penn C | 1 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this reaction which produces the namesake beta-hydroxy carbonyl compound by forming an enolate, which then attacks a carbonyl.
